pullRequest.title: Fix stage overview settings link
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #8490
Description:


Add template information to the dashboard api response.


Redirect to templates edit page stage tab when pipeline is defined using template.

commit.message:
Add template information to the dashboard api response (#8490)

* add 'is_using_template' and 'template_name' as part of 'template_info'
  to the dashboard API response.

* template information is required to decide stage settings link.
Redirect to templates edit page stage tab when pipeline is defined using template. (#8490)
